attributes.action: We the People Want UK to declare Pakistan, State Sponsor of Terrorism
attributes.background: Not only is Pakistan an untrustworthy ally, Islamabad has also aided and abetted enemies of the World for years.  From harboring Osama bin Laden to 26/11 Mumbai attack, there is more than enough evidence to determine whose side Pakistan is on in the War on Terror.  State Sponsor of Terrorism.”

rejection.details:
“State Sponsors of Terrorism” is a designation used by the Department of State in the United States of America. This designation is not used in this way by the UK Government.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to take a specific action to address your concerns about Pakistan.
